quet: What is this application and how does it work ?
content: This application uses artificial intelligence algorithms to analyze the symptoms you enter and provide a preliminary diagnosis. It also offers advice and recommendations for further actions.

quet: Is the diagnosis provided by the application accurate ?
content: The diagnosis provided by the application is based on AI algorithms and is intended to offer preliminary insights. It should not replace professional medical advice. Always consult a healthcare provider for an accurate diagnosis and treatment plan.

quet: How do I enter my symptoms and get a diagnosis ?
content: You can enter your symptoms by filling out a form with your personal details and a description of your symptoms. You also have the option to upload images if relevant. Once submitted, the AI algorithms will analyze the data and provide a preliminary diagnosis and recommendations.

quet: Is my personal information safe and secure ?
content: Yes, we prioritize the security and privacy of your personal information. All data is encrypted and stored securely. We comply with relevant data protection regulations to ensure your information is safe.

quet: Can I use this application for any kind of symptoms ?
content: The application is designed to handle a wide range of common symptoms. However, it may not cover all possible medical conditions. If you have severe or unusual symptoms, it is important to seek immediate medical attention from a healthcare professional.
